message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $180 is a bit higher than I'm looking to spend. How about $140?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $160?
I appreciate you being willing to compromise, Alice.  $160 is still a bit too high for me. Let's try $155.  I'm really hoping to make this work.
I understand you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $157.50?
